recipe.title: Creole Sauce with Yellow Peppers
ingredients: a 28-ounce to 32-ounce can plum tomatoes, drained and chopped
instructions: In a heavy saucepan cook onions, bell pepper, celery, and garlic in oil over moderately low heat, stirring occasionally, until celery is softened. Add tomatoes, broth, and thyme and simmer sauce 25 minutes, or until most of liquid is evaporated. Season sauce with salt and pepper. Sauce may be prepared 1 day ahead and kept chilled, covered.
